lines: Careers, like rockets, don't always take off on schedule. The key is to keep working the engines.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e506f7320>

lines: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e506f3680>

lines: Far and away the best prize that life offers is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e506f0340>

lines: From every mountainside, let freedom ring.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e5075bff0>

lines: Everyone has a right to peaceful coexistence, the basic personal freedoms, the alleviation of suffering, and the opportunity to lead a productive life.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e50758210>

lines: True patriotism springs from a belief in the dignity of the individual, freedom and equality not only for Americans but for all people on earth.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e507547f0>

lines: May we think of freedom, not as the right to do as we please, but as the opportunity to do what is right.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e50750970>

lines: Freedom is not the absence of commitments, but the ability to choose - and commit myself to - what is best for me.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e5076ce40>

lines: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e507696a0>

lines: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e507658c0>

lines: A bend in the road is not the end of the road unless you fail to make the turn.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e50761ae0>

lines: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e5077cdb8>

lines: We all have big changes in our lives that are more or less a second chance.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e50777c78>

lines: Believe in yourself and go for it.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e50771eb8>

lines: Your self-worth is determined by you. You don’t have to depend on someone telling you who you are.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e5079c500>

lines: Magic is believing in yourself, if you can do that, you can make anything happen.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e50796c40>

lines: It is our privilege and our adventure to discover our own special light.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e50792460>

lines: You are braver than you believe, smarter than you seem, and stronger than you think.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e507ae430>

lines: My father gave me the greatest gift anyone could give another person: he believed in me.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e507a97f0>

lines: Let your joy be in your journey—not in some distant goal.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e507a5010>

lines: Comparison is the thief of joy.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e507a0830>

lines: Joy is a decision, a really brave one, about how you are going to respond to life.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e5318b550>

lines: Joy blooms where minds and hearts are open.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e53187810>

lines: The real voyage of discovery consists of not in seeking new landscapes but in having new eyes.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e53183990>

lines: There are always new things to find out if you go looking for them.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e531be7e8>

lines: By mutual confidence and mutual aid great deeds are done, and great discoveries made.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e531b99c8>

lines: Discovery is seeing what everybody else has seen, and thinking what nobody else has thought.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e531cff20>

lines: You have to leave the city of your comfort and go into the wilderness of your intuition. What you'll discover will be wonderful. What you'll discover is yourself.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e531cae80>

lines: The world is incomprehensibly beautiful—an endless prospect of magic and wonder.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e531c5ca0>

lines: Nature brings solace in all troubles.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e531c1240>

lines: The wilderness holds answers to questions we have not yet learned to ask.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e531dd490>

lines: An early morning walk is a blessing for the whole day.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e531d96b0>

lines: Of all the paths you take in life, make sure a few of them are dirt.
author: <Author:0x00007f6e531d5bf0>
